judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
518 A.2d 265
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION v. Phillip LONGO and Beverly Ann Longo, husband and wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 1986.
Decided Dec. 10, 1986.
John D. Snyder, West Chester, for appellants.
Michael H. Kline, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
